name: Candy Nerd Legend - Lucky Nerd Match3 Jackpot Puzzle
name_original: Candy Nerd Legend - Lucky Nerd Match3 Jackpot Puzzle
description:
Candy Nerd Legend is the fastest, most explosive candy jewel-matching game you’ll ever play! Match 3 or more candy bubble as fast as you can in just 60 seconds and challenge your friends or the world to beat your score in weekly leaderboards!

Test your matching skills in this exciting, ultra addictive gem matching game, featuring multiple fun modes. Use awesome candy swipe power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous gem packed levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

It's time to take your Fast moving fun game. Best match 3 puzzle solving and detective skills to the limit in this unique match-3 puzzle game! Join a detective duo on a one-of-a-kind, globetrotting adventure. Can you help them uncover hidden christmas jewel candy secrets adventure and solve the mystery before it's too late?

Tap on two or more adjacent blocks to make them crush, and try to scoring as many points as possible!Beware, once you pop, you can't stop!

Rules and Features:
hundreds of thousands well designed levels.
- when gaming,it will randomly appear some props,which are very useful.
- pay attention to the changes of the background color of the removed gems
- if any swap position can not reach the condition(3 or more the same in one line), then you lost this level.

Challenge your Facebook friends or the world to beat your highest score and claim a Gold medal in our weekly leaderboards!
